wikipedia_page.main: David Anthony (born 18 December 1989) is a British wheelchair rugby athlete and member of the Great Britain national wheelchair rugby team. He represented Great Britain at the 2012 Summer Paralympics in London.

response: *18 December – David Anthony, Wheelchair rugby player
